Monday selfie
Happy Monday!Who else needs a haircut and a beard trim? I sure do.I also remembered I haven't used all my FSA money this year and I think it's not rolling over like last year. Time to find new glasses, I guess.#Monday #SelfieTherapy #Selfie

content.html:
Monday selfie

Happy Monday!

Who else needs a haircut and a beard trim? I sure do.

I also remembered I haven't used all my FSA money this year and I think it's not rolling over like last year. Time to find new glasses, I guess.

#Monday #SelfieTherapy #Selfie
